item.title: NFL Injury Report Week 15: Commanders, Raiders, Jets Without Starting QB
item.description: Here's who's in and who's out in Week 15 of the NFL season.

item.title: Heisman Trophy Ballot Results: Indiana's Fernando Mendoza Wins In Landslide
item.description: The voting results for this year's Heisman Trophy race are in following Indiana QB Fernando Mendoza's historic victory.

item.title: Yaxel Lendeborg's Big Game Helps No. 2 Michigan Stay Unbeaten In Win vs. Maryland
item.description: Yaxel Lendeborg had 29 points, and No. 2 Michigan rallied from a nine-point deficit Saturday night to defeat Maryland.

item.title: No. 9 Oklahoma Defeats No. 23 Oklahoma State 92-70 for 10th Consecutive Win
item.description: Raegan Beers scored 22 points and grabbed 12 rebounds in No. 9 Oklahoma's 92-70 win over No. 23 Oklahoma State.

item.title: Azzi Fudd Leads No. 1 UConn's Rout of No. 16 USC With JuJu Watkins Sidelined
item.description: Azzi Fudd scored 17 points and No. 1 UConn routed 16th-ranked USC on Saturday night, 79-51.
